title: EP 49: Tactical Marketing Hacks
itunes:title: EP 49: Tactical Marketing Hacks
description:
In this episode of The Tactical Entrepreneur podcast, Steve talks about some tactical marketing hacks that everyone out there can use, and they will all make a huge difference.

 

  • Talk about the results that your product or service provides, not the features.
  • Take advantage of short-term plays.
  • Double down on what works.
  • Promote yourself as much as the company you're promoting.
  • Understand the power of your existing customers.
  • Capture retargeting info.
  • Use email to nurture.
  • Have a plan.
  • Don't be afraid to use calls to action.
  • Encourage your loyal customers to share their experiences.
  • Embrace content marketing.

 

“Talk about results that your product or service provides, not the features.”

   - Steve Schabacker

 

How To Get Involved:

Steve Schabacker is the co-founder of Sheepdog Firearms and an entrepreneur, bestselling author, and marketer. Between his business and his content, Steve is educating firearm owners and armed professionals and setting a new standard for shops and training centers in the industry.

 

You can visit Sheepdog Firearms online or reach out directly to Steve at sschabacker@outlook.com.

 

Check out this podcast on Apple Podcasts - don’t forget to subscribe, rate, and review!
